name: Jigabyte
text: You can only control 1 "Jigabyte". If you control a Spellcaster monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 monster with 1500 ATK/200 DEF from your Deck, except "Jigabyte".
